CustomField.description: Duration of the subscription of this product in months. Acts as a static duration. If the user is unable to select a duration on the cart / product detail page, then B2B Commerce uses this field to determine how long a subscription lasts.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Duration of the subscription of this product in months. Acts as a static duration. If the user is unable to select a duration on the cart / product detail page, then B2B Commerce uses this field to determine how long a subscription lasts.
CustomField.label: Subscription Duration
